force.description: If the policy you are attempting to set on a repository policy would prevent you from setting another policy in the future, you must force the SetRepositoryPolicy operation. This is intended to prevent accidental repository lock outs.

policyText.description: The JSON repository policy text to apply to the repository.

registryId.description: The AWS account ID associated with the registry that contains the repository. If you do not specify a registry, the default registry is assumed.

repositoryName.description: The name of the repository to receive the policy.
